item.title: A new retail bank emerges
item.description: ANZ Plus - creating a digital first cloud based banking platform In 2022 ANZ Bank launch a new digital bank with financial wellbeing at its core called ANZ Plus.

item.title: Google Cloud Next
item.description: Cloud Next 2019 - Google Cloud DevOps: Speed With Reliability and Security After an earlier talk in Sydney, Australia the Google team asked if I could present at Google Cloud Next in San Francisco.

item.title: DevOps Talks Conference 2018
item.description: DevOps Talks Conference 2018 - The road to Kubernetes This is the story of how a small 5 person “Pitcrew” team grew into a 30+ person Platform Engineering Team.
